publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1017 Mr Brian Monteith: Healthy Fathering Initiative—That the Parliament notes that Sunday 18 June is the first "Fathers Day" of the new Millennium; welcomes the role of the Healthy Fathering Initiative project initiated by the Aberlour Child Care Trust in promoting better ways to involve fathers in their children’s lives, and recognises the important input of fathers to a stable family life.
S1M-1017 Healthy Fathering Initiative (lodged on 16 June 2000) David McLetchie*
S1M-1017 Healthy Fathering Initiative (lodged on 16 June 2000) Phil Gallie*, Nora Radcliffe*

S1M-1017 Mr Brian Monteith: Healthy Fathering Initiative—That the Parliament notes that Sunday 18 June is the first "Fathers Day" of the new Millennium; welcomes the role of the Healthy Fathering Initiative project initiated by the Aberlour Child Care Trust in promoting better ways to involve fathers in their children’s lives, and recognises the important input of fathers to a stable family life. Supported by: David McLetchie, Phil Gallie, Nora Radcliffe

S1M-1017 Mr Brian Monteith: Healthy Fathering Initiative—That the Parliament notes that Sunday 18 June is the first "Fathers Day" of the new Millennium; welcomes the role of the Healthy Fathering Initiative project initiated by the Aberlour Child Care Trust in promoting better ways to involve fathers in their children’s lives, and recognises the important input of fathers to a stable family life. Supported by: David McLetchie, Phil Gallie, Nora Radcliffe
